```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(pracma)
library(plotly)
library(scales)
library(prophet)
library(lubridate)
library(RSQLite)
```
```{r, echo=FALSE}
rm(list=ls())
#these libraries are necessary
#create the URL where the dataset is stored with automatic upDates every day
db <- dbConnect(SQLite(), dbname="../db/CORVID.sqlite3")

JHUDATA<- dbGetQuery(db, "SELECT country,Date,confirmed,deaths,recovered FROM JHUDATA;")
colnames(JHUDATA) <- c("Countries","Date","Cases","Deaths","Recovered")
JHUDATA$Date <- as.Date(JHUDATA$Date)
```
```{r,echo=FALSE}

JHULATEST <-  JHUDATA %>% 
  group_by(Date, Countries) %>%
  summarise(
    TotalCases = sum(Cases, na.rm=TRUE),
    TotalDeaths = sum(Deaths,na.rm=TRUE)
  ) %>% 
  group_by(Countries) %>%
  arrange(desc(Date)) %>%
  mutate(
    PreviousTotalCases = lead(TotalCases),
    PreviousTotalDeaths = lead(TotalDeaths)
  ) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  na.omit()
JHULATEST <- JHULATEST %>% mutate(NewCases = TotalCases - PreviousTotalCases)
JHULATEST <- JHULATEST %>% mutate(NewDeaths = TotalDeaths - PreviousTotalDeaths)
JHULATEST$Date <- as.character(JHULATEST$Date)
dbWriteTable(db, "JHULATEST",JHULATEST ,overwrite=TRUE)
JHULATEST$Date <- as.Date(JHULATEST$Date)
```
```{r,echo=FALSE}
dbDisconnect(db)

```


### Data Source: John Hopkins Coronavirus Resource Center
* URL: https://coronavirus.jhu.edu/map.html

### The US COVID-19  Daily  Totals : Cases, Deaths and Death Rate.


```{r, echo=FALSE}
JHU_daily_total_US <- JHULATEST %>% filter(Countries == "US" )
# Calculate Summary Cases and Deaths(World)
# World
# JHUDATA Summary by Year
US_yearly_total <- JHU_daily_total_US %>% group_by(Yearly =floor_date(Date,"year")) %>%                                             summarise(
  
                                    tc = sum(NewCases),
                                   td = sum(NewDeaths),
                                   # mean_cases = mean(TotalCases),
                                   # mean_deaths = mean(TotalDeaths),
                                    death_rate = td/tc,
                                    Count = n())

# Summary by Month
US_monthly_total <- JHU_daily_total_US %>% group_by(Monthly =floor_date(Date,"month")) %>%                                            summarise(
                                        tc = sum(NewCases),
                                        td = sum(NewDeaths), 
                                        # mean_cases = mean(TotalCases),
                                       # mean_deaths = mean(TotalDeaths),                                                        death_rate = td/tc,
                                        Count = n())

## Weekly Summary
US_weekly_total <- JHU_daily_total_US %>% group_by(Weekly =floor_date(Date,"week")) %>%                                             summarise(
                                      tc = sum(NewCases),
                                      td = sum(NewDeaths),
                                      mean_cases = mean(TotalCases),
                                    #  mean_deaths = mean(TotalDeaths),
                                     death_rate = td/tc,
                                      Count = n())

## Daily Summary
us_daily_total <- JHU_daily_total_US %>% group_by(Daily =floor_date(Date,"day")) %>%                                              summarise(
                                    tc = sum(NewCases),
                                    td = sum(NewDeaths),  
                                    mean_cases = mean(TotalCases),
                                  #  mean_deaths = mean(TotalDeaths),
                                    death_rate = td/tc,
                                    Count = n())
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
us_daily_total %>% plot_ly() %>% add_bars(x=~Daily,y=~tc) %>% 
        layout(title="US: Total Number of Cases By Date")


us_daily_total %>% plot_ly() %>% add_bars(x=~Daily,y=~td) %>% 
        layout(title="US: Total Number of Deaths by Date")

us_daily_total %>% plot_ly() %>% add_bars(x=~Daily,y=~death_rate) %>% 
        layout(title="US: Percent of Cases Ending in Death by Week") 
      
```

####  Cases and Deaths are Accumulated to date.

```{r,echo=FALSE}
JHU_acc_US <- JHUDATA %>% filter(Countries == "US" )
# Calculate Summary Cases and Deaths(World)
# World
# JHUDATA Summary by Year
US_acc_yearly <- JHU_acc_US %>% group_by(Yearly =floor_date(Date,"year")) %>%                                             summarise(
  
                                    tc = sum(Cases),
                                    td = sum(Deaths),
                                    mean_cases = mean(Cases),
                                    mean_deaths = mean(Deaths),
                                    death_rate = td/tc,
                                    Count = n())

# Summary by Month
US_acc_monthly <- JHU_acc_US %>% group_by(Monthly =floor_date(Date,"month")) %>%                                            summarise(
                                        tc = sum(Cases),
                                        td = sum(Deaths), 
                                        mean_cases = mean(Cases),
                                        mean_deaths = mean(Deaths),                                                        death_rate = td/tc,
                                        Count = n())

## Weekly Summary
US_acc_weekly <- JHU_acc_US %>% group_by(Weekly =floor_date(Date,"week")) %>%                                             summarise(
                                      tc = sum(Cases),
                                      td = sum(Deaths),
                                      mean_cases = mean(Cases),
                                      mean_deaths = mean(Deaths),
                                      death_rate = td/tc,
                                      Count = n())

## Daily Summary
us_acc_daily <- JHU_acc_US %>% group_by(Daily =floor_date(Date,"day")) %>%                                              summarise(
                                    tc = sum(Cases),
                                    td = sum(Deaths),  
                                    mean_cases = mean(Cases),
                                    mean_deaths = mean(Deaths),
                                    death_rate = td/tc,
                                    Count = n())
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
us_acc_daily %>% plot_ly() %>% add_bars(x=~Daily,y=~tc) %>% 
        layout(title="US: Total Accumulated  Cases By Day")


us_acc_daily %>% plot_ly() %>% add_bars(x=~Daily,y=~td) %>% 
        layout(title="US: Total Accumulated Deaths By Day")

us_acc_daily %>% plot_ly() %>% add_bars(x=~Daily,y=~death_rate) %>% 
        layout(title="US: Percent of Cases Ending in Death by Week") 
      
```
